alert.note: Alert for McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 29 at 12:02PM EDT until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Georgia, including the following county, McIntosh. * WHEN...Until 200 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1201 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Darien, Ridgeville, Carnigan, Meridian, Valona, Crescent, Ashintilly and Ardick.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
